Francis Hugh Maycock (1903-1980) was Principal at Pusey House from 1952 until 1970.</ref>), Tolkien loosely inserted a brief note to Maycock, apologising for the delay "in performing my promise" and now sending "a copy of the Japanese 'Hobbit' with best wishes including Christmas blessings".<ref>{{webcite
